辧字的基本解释

辧
biàn
古同“辨”。

辧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biàn］
［《廣韻》符蹇切，上獮，並。］
“班2”的被通假字。亦作“辧1”。“釆1”的今字。
(1)辨别；区分。
(2)不同，区别。
(3)明白；清楚。
(4)指明了、详悉。
(5)谓考问而确定。
(6)表明；显示。
(7)察看；辨认。
(8)指察觉。
(9)谓视觉敏锐，灵敏。
(10)床足与床身分辨之处。
(11)通“辯”。争论；辩论。
(12)通“辯”。辩解；分说。
(13)通“辯”。谓言辞漂亮、巧妙。
(14)通“辯”。聪明，有智慧。
(15)通“徧”。遍及；周遍。
(16)通“變”。
(17)通“班”。颁布。
(18)通“般”。盛；大。
(19)通“平”。均平。
(20)通“别”。古代借债的契券。参见“辨合”。
(21)古代土地面积单位。
(22)姓。汉有辨武，淮南名士。见《奇姓通》。
[②]［bàn］
［《廣韻》蒲莧切，去襇，並。］
“辦1”的古字。亦作“辧2”。
(1)备办。
(2)治理。

辧字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辛字部】　辧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1251第19
同辨。【說文】判也。　【字彙】从力與从刀不同，力取致力之義，刀取判別之義。

辧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
辧字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhe
Basic explanation of words
Zhe
biàn
Gu Tong "discriminates".
Zhe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biàn］
["Guangyun" Fu Jianqie, go up, and merge. ]
"Class 2" was passed falsely. Also known as "辧1". The present character of "釆1".
(1) Identify; distinguish.
(2) Different, different.
(3) Understand; be clear.
(4) Specified and detailed.
(5) It is determined by examination and inquiry.
(6) Show; show.
(7) Observe; identify.
(8) Refers to perception.
(9) It is said that the vision is sharp and sensitive.
(10) The place where the foot of the bed is distinguished from the bed.
(11) Through "debate". Controversy
(12) Through "debate". Justify; say separately.
(13) Through "debate". The words are beautiful and clever.
(14) Through "debate". Smart and wise.
(15) Through "pass". All over; all over.
(16) Through "change".
(17) Through "class". Promulgated.
(18) Through "general". grand.
(19) Through "ping". Evenly.
(20) Pass "Don't". Deed of ancient debt. See "discrimination".
(21) Ancient land area unit.
(22) Last name. There are distinguished martial arts in the Han Dynasty, Huainan famous scholars. See "Qi Xing Tong".
[②]［bàn］
["Guangyun" Pu Yi cuts, goes to the bust, and merges. ]
The ancient word for "办1". Also known as "辧2".
(1) Prepared.
(2) Governance.
Zhe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Xin Zi Department] 　辧; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1251 Page 19
The same discrimination. [Said the text] sentence also.　【Vocabulary】Congli is different from the knife, the force takes the meaning of dedication, and the knife takes the meaning of discrimination.
